# Get the game

We've just finished a highly successful crowdfunding campaign raising funds to bring this game into the world. Yay! We are now working on the final game production and printing, and will post updates here. The Big Fish Game is not available in shops yet, but you can still order your copy through the crowdfunding page on Kickstarter.
:::::::::::

::::::::::: {.grid .column-screen .mx-1 .mx-sm-2 .mx-md-3 .mx-xl-4 .spacer-1em .text-center style="--bs-columns: 1;"}
[Kickstarter Page](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/bigfishcardgame/big-fish-the-tasmanian-fishing-and-ocean-card-game){.btn .btn-secondary}
:::::::::::

::::::::::: {.grid .column-screen .mx-1 .mx-sm-2 .mx-md-3 .mx-xl-4 .spacer-1em .text-center style="--bs-columns: 1;"}
Meanwhile, please [get in touch](mailto:info@fishsizeproject.org) if you have further ideas on how to promote and fund the game and engagement actitivities, if you are a teacher and would like to use the game in your lessons, or if you have other questions or suggestions.
:::::::::::
